sources.name: UTReportingUnits
sources.script:
source(output(
		ReportingUnitUUID as string,
		ReportingUnitNativeID as string,
		ReportingUnitName as string,
		ReportingUnitTypeCV as string,
		ReportingUnitUpdateDate as string,
		ReportingUnitProductVersion as string,
		StateCV as string,
		EPSGCodeCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTReportingUnits

sinks.name: NormalizedReportingUnits
sinks.script:
UTReportingUnits sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['reportingunits.csv']) ~> NormalizedReportingUnits
